definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: I am served my meals on my couch.
sentences.chinese: 有人給我端來飯菜，我就在沙發上進餐。

sentences.english: dry red table wine from the Rioja region of northern Spain.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙北部里奧哈地區進餐時引用的乾紅葡萄酒。

sentences.english: She would help them with meals, and carefully screen their medicine .
sentences.chinese: 她開始幫着他們進餐，仔細地幫他們整理和篩選藥品。

sentences.english: Dining room is at ordinary times family dines jointly or the life space of repast of fete relatives and friends.
sentences.chinese: 餐室是平時家人共同進餐或宴請親友就餐的生活空間。

sentences.english: Take 1 mini capsule twice daily to support a healthy heart.
sentences.chinese: 每日一至兩粒，進餐時服。

sentences.english: My father and I only meet at meals.
sentences.chinese: 我父親和我只在進餐時間相聚。

sentences.english: Families would go to church and return home to eat together around the table.
sentences.chinese: 全家人會去教堂，然後回家圍聚在餐桌旁一塊兒進餐。

sentences.english: Aim To study the lipoproteins metabolism characteristic of diabetics after meal.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究糖尿病人進餐後脂蛋白代謝特點。

sentences.english: As Mrs Beeton said, all creatures eat, but "man only dines".
sentences.chinese: 比頓夫人說，萬物生靈都要喫，但是“唯有人進餐”。

sentences.english: On the day they visited him, Professor Huggins was dining.
sentences.chinese: 警方拜訪哈金斯教授的那天，他正在進餐。

sentences.english: The child is not big enough to sit at table yet .
sentences.chinese: 那孩子尚小，不能坐在餐桌前進餐。

sentences.english: The general condescended to eat with the soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 這位將軍屈尊與士兵一同進餐。

sentences.english: Would you care for an aperitif before you meal?
sentences.chinese: 進餐前您要不要來杯開胃酒？

sentences.english: First of all, food systems between China and Occident are different.
sentences.chinese: 首先，西方國家和中國的進餐方式不同。

sentences.english: If you remove the pleasure from dining, why bother cooking at all?
sentences.chinese: 如果你無視進餐的樂趣，何苦還要麻煩廚師呢？

sentences.english: During stops for meals, he would light the gas stove and cook instant noodles.
sentences.chinese: 等待進餐期間，他會打開煤氣爐去煮方便麪。

definition: to purchase/to buy/to do one's shopping/purchasing agent/buyer
(at a restaurant) to order a meal/(of a waiter) to take an order
to wish to continue sth/to have not fully expressed oneself
